meanings.definition: Inclined to talk more than others.
meanings.sent1: She is the talkier one in our group of friends.
meanings.sent2: He became even talkier after drinking coffee.
meanings.sent3: The talkier parrot in the pet store entertained us all.
meanings.sent4: Her talkier nature made her the life of the party.
meanings.sent5: The talkier child in the classroom always had a story to share.

meanings.sent1: This book is talkier than the one I read last week.
meanings.sent2: The new radio host is talkier than the previous one.
meanings.sent3: The talkier cat in the shelter kept meowing for attention.
meanings.sent4: His talkier approach to sales pitches yielded better results.
meanings.sent5: The talkier song on the album became an instant hit.
